name: @hono-telescope/core
description: Core monitoring and debugging utilities for Hono Telescope

scripts.build: tsc && cp -r ../dashboard/dist/. dist/dashboard/ && cp -r ../../packages/types/dist/. dist/types/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const walk=(dir)=>{fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f=>{const p=path.join(dir,f);if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory())walk(p);else if(p.endsWith('.js')){let c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');c=c.replace(/@hono-telescope\/types/g,'./types');fs.writeFileSync(p,c);}});};walk('dist');"
